Sequence Information.Source: Asian bombinid toad species, Bombina orientalis
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25056849] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=7 μM, MBC=14 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=14 μM, MBC=14 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=7 μM, MBC=14 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25056849] 100% hemolysis at 125 mg/L against horse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans

Literature.Title: Feleucin-BO1 A Novel Antimicrobial Non-Apeptide Amide from the Skin Secretion of the Toad, Bombina orientalis, and Design of a Potent Broad-Spectrum Synthetic Analogue, Feleucin-K3
Literature.Reference: Chem Biol Drug Des. 2015 Mar;85(3)259-67. doi 10.1111/cbdd.12396.
Literature.Author: Xiaojuan Hou, Qiang Du, Renjie Li, Mei Zhou, Hui Wang, Lei Wang, Can Guo, Tianbao Chen and Chris Shaw
